name: Annie Breckenfeld
biography: Annie Breckenfeld moved from New York City to Seattle in 1987 to pursue her dream of creating designs from start to finish; from initial idea to final product. She wanted to market her own and partner Brent Markee’s designs. Together they left Smart Design and launched Local Design, focusing on shoes, lamps and sconces. Today, Breckenfeld designs for Urban Hardwoods.
